Documentation: Is the unique identification of a client.
Each outbound delivery has an unique identifier, the outbound delivery number. Outbound deliveries of different clients and system partners can however have the same delivery number.
Unique identification of a system partner (see SystemPartner).
Other End (LoadAid): Contains the loading aid that has been registered for the OgLuExt.
Contains the delivered quantity for a certain loading aid and OgLuExt.
Contains the not exchangeable quantity for a loading aid and OgLuExt.
Is a part of the unique identification of an item.
The variant is the most precise description of an item. With the help of the variant, e.g. colours or sizes of clothing can be specified. Is a part of the unique identification of an item.
Unique identification of a partner object.
